name: The Fool
description: The item has no base modifier, but is Levellable. For each improvement to the base modifier in this reading, the item starts with +1 upgrade point.

name: The Magician
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that grants a 1/LR free casting of a random spell of level up to your hypothetical highest.

name: The High Priestess
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is randomly chosen from a random glyph path.

name: The Empress
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is randomly chosen from a random relic.

name: The Emperor
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is a randomly chosen passive from a random monster of CR up to your level.

name: The Hierophant
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that grants +2 to a random ability score's maximum value.

name: The Lovers
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is a randomly chosen ally bonus from a random amulet.

name: The Chariot
description: The item has 1 additional modifier of a chosen Affinity, which has a minimum point value of 2.

name: Justice
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is of the same Affinity as the base modifier, which has a minimum point value of 2.

name: The Hermit
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is a randomly chosen Knack from a random class.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that has a minimum point value of 2 and is negated, then the resulting points are granted to the base modifier.

name: Strength
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that grants a 1/LR free usage of a random maneuver of degree up to your hypothetical highest.

name: The Hanged Man
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that is randomly chosen from the standard affix pool, and has a minimum point value of 3.

name: Death
description: The item is transformed into a dormant glyph, which when consumed replaces your next glyph path tier with the item's effects. Before you consume this glyph, you find out what your next glyph path tier would grant you.

name: Temperance
description: The item is not created. Instead, the other 2 cards from this reading are added to your next reading, which can have up to 4 cards total in it (allowing you to perform a reading with 2 new cards).

name: The Devil
description: The item is crafted as if its reading contained an additional card, which is randomly chosen from all cards that are currently in the possession of players, including from this reading.

name: The Tower
description: The item has 1 additional chaotic modifier.

name: The Stars
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that you can define (DM will balance for max 4pts).

name: The Moon
description: The item has 1 additional modifier. Instead of applying to you, the modifier is negated and applied to creatures of your choice within a 60' aura.

name: The Sun
description: The item has 1 additional modifier. Instead of applying to you, the modifier is applied to creatures of your choice within a 60' aura.

name: Judgement
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that has a minimum point value of 5, but it is only applied to you after you go down for the first time between rests.

name: The World
description: The item has 1 additional modifier that grants an expertise die in a random journey activity.

name: Ace of Wands
description: The item's base mod modifier must have either the 'Spell' or 'Type' Affinity. Draw a card from the Wands deck. If the card is numeric, it sets the minimum point value of the item's base modifier to that value. Court cards add an additional base modifier of the following Affinities: HP or Minion (King), Spell or Damage over Time (Queen), Weapon or Defence (Knight), or Type or Debuff (Page).

name: Ace of Cups
description: The item's base modifier must have either the 'HP' or 'Minion' Affinity. Draw a card from the Cups deck. If the card is numeric, it sets the minimum point value of the item's base modifier to that value. Court cards add an additional base modifier of the following Affinities: HP or Minion (King), Spell or Damage over Time (Queen), Weapon or Defence (Knight), or Type or Debuff (Page).

name: Ace of Swords
description: The item's base modifier must have either the 'Weapon' or 'Damage over Time' Affinity. Draw a card from the Wands deck. If the card is numeric, it sets the minimum point value of the item's base modifier to that value. Court cards add an additional base modifier of the following Affinities: HP or Minion (King), Spell or Damage over Time (Queen), Weapon or Defence (Knight), or Type or Debuff (Page).

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: The item's base modifier must have either the 'Defence' or 'Debuff' Affinity. Draw a card from the Cups deck. If the card is numeric, it sets the minimum point value of the item's base modifier to that value. Court cards add an additional base modifier of the following Affinities: HP or Minion (King), Spell or Damage over Time (Queen), Weapon or Defence (Knight), or Type or Debuff (Page).
